analysis.Summary: Vue single-file component that renders a gear/settings SVG icon with a customizable fill color.
analysis.Purpose: Provides a reusable settings icon for use throughout the application’s UI.

Components.name: IconSettings
Components.role: Root Vue component wrapping an inline SVG of a gear icon; exposes a `fill` prop to control the SVG path fill color.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.description: Composition API helper to declare component props.

fill.description: CSS color value applied to the SVG path fill.

Dependencies: CSS custom property --black for default color
analysis.Usage: Import `IconSettings.vue` into other components or pages and include it in the template: `<IconSettings fill="red" />` or rely on the default fill.
Notes: No `<style>` block is defined; styling relies entirely on the SVG attributes and external CSS variables.
The SVG viewBox is set to 0 0 512 512 with an explicit render size of 800×800px—dimensions can be overridden via CSS or parent container.
